comments:
I did a commit, which failed with a broken pipe error, presumably because of a network connection problem. I then right-clicked on my project again and hit "Commit", and got this error:

Looks related to bug 101499, but the stack trace is not identical. Also, unlike that bug, I was not doing anything concurrently with the CVS operation.

The symptoms are a bit different but the cause is the same.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 101499 ***
